snippet.title: Hotel Renovator - PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Unleash your creativity now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1214470/Hotel_Renovator/?utm_campaign=HR_Launch&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Hotel Renovator is out! 
Watch the Launch Trailer and get ready to design the interiors of your dreams

Focus Entertainment and Two Horizons are thrilled to announce that Hotel Renovator is out! The simulation game where you design the hotel of your dreams is now available to play on PC, with a console launch later this year on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. Watch the Launch Trailer and start your adventurous business slash creative journey now!

Embark on a makeover journey

In Hotel Renovator, unleash your inner designer and renovate the hotel of your dreams! Let your creative instincts run wild in Sandbox Mode, or uncover your grandfather’s past and carry on his legacy in Story Mode. Take matters into your own hands after you inherit a run-down hotel, working out smart management and sharp investment to take your hotel on a journey from shabby to glory!

From interior architecture to decoration and hospitality, draw upon over 2,000 interior items to bring your unique vision of home design and customer experience into the 5-star business.

Hotel Renovator will let the creativity run even wilder by offering mod support post-launch, so get ready to create and share unique content, lending and drawing inspiration from a community of like minded renovators!

Hotel Renovator is available now on PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store. The game will release later this year on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S. Sign up as a Focus member to get exclusive news and upcoming special offers for Hotel Renovator and the whole Focus catalog.
